lines.text: Did you ever suck the jelly out of a jelly doughnut and then fill it with chocolate swirl ice cream?
How'd you like to stuff one of them in a doughnut!

[to Frankie]
You know what your problem is, Junior? You don't know how to run your plate. See? You gotta make the bread come out even with the eggs.
Give me those keys or I'll cut you down to your balls!
Dom, what's happening to you? Don't you remember? "Da, da, da, da"?
"Da, da, da, da" your ass! Give me those keys!
Maybe I AM crazy. Is it crazy to hate yourself?

[to a picture of his mother]
How you loved to feed me! Look at your chubby baby now, ma, I'm a fat, fat man, a damn fatso. I can't stop the fat!
The good people are the fat people.
You love bread, I don't love bread, I only LIKE bread!
Mrs. Goodman, would you be my chubby checker?
Lasagna for you, broiled chicken and kale for me, no bread.

[reading a greeting card]
"I miss your warmth. I miss your grace. I miss your laugh. I miss your face. Happy Birthday, son, across the miles."
